meanings.definition: A five-pointed star used in magic or as a symbol in some religions.
meanings.sent1: The magician drew a pentacles on the floor for the ritual.
meanings.sent2: The necklace had a beautiful pentacles pendant.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the pentacles, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like pentacles in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The pentacles glowed with an otherworldly light.

meanings.definition: A coin bearing a representation of a five-pointed star.
meanings.sent1: He collected rare pentacles from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The ancient pentacles were made of gold.
meanings.sent3: She found a pentacles in the couch cushions.
meanings.sent4: His smile was worth more than all the pentacles in the world.
meanings.sent5: The pentacles jingled in his pocket as he walked.
